attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There should be a roll over provision on second homes that no capital gains tax should be charged when a second home is sold and a new one bought.
The government is taxing inflation on tax paid money, and when you die take their share again. We need to be given a tax break by way of rollover provisons

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
